summary: About a young girl who finds a pear of pink ballet shoes and is taken to a magical ballet land.There she learns how to help her friends and follow her instincts.
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Katie Crown|Ali Liebert|Brett Dier|Tabitha St. Germain|Bill Mondy|Lori Triolo|Teryl Rothery|Trevor Devall|Kyle Rideout
